name: Shadow of the Future
text:
You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose:
. Remove the top 3 cards of your deck from the game → remove Shadow of the Future from the game.
. Discard 1 tech card you control. Discard 3 cards from your deck. Discard this obligation.

name: Early Start
text: Kang went back in time to show his younger self what he is destined to become... Hoping that he would start this path earlier than planned. When Revealed: Exhaust each Iron Lad upgrade in play. While this scheme is in play, Iron Lad upgrades cannot be readied.

name: Kang the Conqueror
text: Toughness. Villainous. When Revealed: Put the highest cost Iron Lad upgrade in play under Kang the Conqueror. When Defeated: Return the upgrade under here to its owner's hand. Set Kang the Conqueror aside.

name: Taking Responsability
text: Forced Response: After you attack or thwart, discard the top card of your deck. Action: Remove the top card of your deck from the game → discard this obligation. “Fine, I'll go with you...” -Iron Lad

name: Pay the Price
text: When Revealed: Discard 8 cards from your deck. If less than 8 cards were discarded this way, this card gains surge.
flavor: "Make no mistake, this is your handiwork." -Kang the Conqueror
